displaytitle: Classical landscape with Carlo, Ubaldo, and the magician
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown and grey wash, heightened with white gouache
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.

texts.textentryhtml:
Gilbert Paignon-Dijoval (1708-1792); 

Charles-Gilbert Morel de Vinde (1759-1842);

Robert Prioleau Roupell (1798-1886);

Robert Low, stamp on mount (L. 2222);

private collector, New York; 

Anderson Galleries sale, New York, February 18, 1921, no. 48;

Frank Jewett Mather, Jr.;

Gift to Princeton University Art Museum
texts.remarks: As per Giada Damen, IMLS Drawings 2018-2020

caption: Claude Lorrain (French, 1604–1682), Classical landscape with Carlo, Ubaldo, and the magician, ca. 1669. Pen and brown ink, brown and grey wash, heightened with white gouache; 17.2 x 23.3 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1947-27)
